DESCRIPTION: Enemies cannot act the turn they are #yFrozen
#yMilling a card moves the top card of the draw pile to the discard pile.
#yBanishing a card #yExhausts it from the discard pile.
#yRecovering a card adds it from the discard pile to the hand.
At the start of your turn, #yRecover #b2 cards and make them #yExhaust.
#yRight #yClick #yyourself #yto #yActivate. If you have less than #b6 cards in your hand, draw until you have #b6 cards. #rUsable #ronce #rper #rturn.
